# The `BlockScalarTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class should be specialized by type that requires custom conversion to/from a YAML literal block scalar. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class should be specialized by type that requires custom conversion to/from a YAML literal block scalar.

For example:

template &lt;&gt; struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/yaml/blockscalartraits">BlockScalarTraits&lt;MyType&gt;</a> &#123; static void output(const MyType &amp;Value, void&#42;, llvm::raw&#95;ostream &amp;Out) &#123; // stream out custom formatting Out &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>; &#125; static <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> input(StringRef Scalar, void&#42;, MyType &amp;Value) &#123; // parse scalar and set <code>value</code> // return empty string on success, or error string return StringRef(); &#125; &#125;;

Definition at line 180 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamltraits-h">YAMLTraits.h</a>.
